title: Objections
content:
Objections

State Regulations
§ 4039.10 - Who may make objection
§ 4039.11 - Objections to be in writing
§ 4039.12 - Leave required to withdraw objection
§ 4039.13 - Liability for costs of inquiry
§ 4039.14 - Deposit may be forfeited
§ 4039.15 - Disqualification of horse before race
§ 4039.16 - Objection to decision of clerk of scales
§ 4039.17 - Objection to distance of course
§ 4039.18 - Objection to matters occurring in race
§ 4039.19 - Time for making other objections
§ 4039.20 - Stewards determine extent of disqualification
§ 4039.21 - Recovery of money distributed
§ 4039.22 - Money held pending determination

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
